channel.title: Guide To The Moparscape Forums!
channel.description:
(this is probobly in the wrong forum, so, mods, please move it into the right forum)
OK, to all you newbies out there, (no offence), this is how to work your thread!!!
First, makeing a new thread, all you hit is the new thread button and type the title(subject) and hit post!
Makeing polls, next to the mew thread button, is the new poll button, hit it then type the title(subject) then type the question, then type the things you want people to vote for, then type your message...
Makeing a post, all you do is when your in a thread, hit, reply, then type your message, or if you wanna quote, hit quote next to the person's post then type your message!!!
Bolding![b]THIS[/b] is a example of bolding....all your do is hit the B button, and, type what your wanna say [b]BOLDED![/b]
Italics!(whatever there spelt!lol!!!) [i]THIS[/i] is a example of italics!!!All you do is hit the slanted I button next to the B (b for bold) button!!!Then type your message!!!!It's easy!!!
Underlineing![u]THIS[/u] is a expample of underlineing!!!All you do is hit the underlined U button then type your message!!!
Glowing![glow=red,2,300]THIS[/glow] is a example of glowing!!!All you do is hit the Green G button and type your message!!!There is many different colors, so, where it says red in [ Glow=red,2,300] delete it and type your color!!!There is the list of colors in the dropdown boxe that says Change Color, some of them don't work though!
Shadowing![shadow=red,left]THIS[/shadow] is a example of shadowing!All you do is hit the D next to the glowing green G button then type your message!!!
Changeing where your text is!!![center]THIS[/center] is [right]HOW[/right] [pre]YOU[/pre] [pre]DO[/pre] this, you hit one of the four buttons with line on them, and type your message!!!
horizontaling is something I don't even know how to do!!!
Makeing your words [size=30pt]BIGGER!!![/size]This is how you do it!!!hit the a with the up and down pointing arrows and where it says 10, [ size=10pt], have it say how big you want it!!!
The rest you will rarely use!!!
Multiple glowing/bolding/underlineing!!!this is my favgorite thing to do!!![b][u][glow=red,2,300]THIS[/glow][/u][/b] is a example of all 3 together, all you do is hit the bold button, then the underline button, then the glow button and type your message!!!its should give you [b][u][glow=red,2,300]Something like this!!![/glow][/u][/b]
GETTING PICTURES ON YOUR THREAD!!!(i dont know how to do it on the webclient, so, i will modifiey it l8ter when i find out.Thank you for your pacients!)Ok, first you will want to have screenshots!!!Hit the F9 button to take a screenshot of the desired picture!!!Then, open up your internet, go to http://imageshack.us/ and hit browse and go into the screenshot section of the moparscape31 folder and double click witch screenshot you want to use, hit the resizeimage box to get a check in it, then, click the drop-down box, hit the 640x480, then, hit host it!then copy and paste the Thumbnail1 UNDER the picture into your thread, and, make your post, and wahla!it should give you a picture!!!LIKE THIS!!!
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img224.imageshack.us/img224/8263/screenshot11uw8.png[/img][/URL]
THIS link is a perfect example of useing all of those!!!(this link is made by me) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,34068.msg406668.html#msg406668
NOW getting links on your thread!(like mine above)OK, when your at a website, copy and past the EXACT adress of it and your should get a link like this!!! http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,34929.msg417350.html#msg417350
(just click it)
Ok, now the little faces you see in posts!!!All you do is click in your post where you want one, and click on the face button you want!!!Its simple!!!!This is the variety!! :) ;) :D :mad: :( :eek: :cool: :rolleyes: :P :o :confused: :| ;D
Now for to stuff you see next to a thread!!!(for example, my thread has a grin face!!!)All you do is under the title/subject, you click the message icon drag-down box and click which one you want!!!There is a display of the icon next to the drop-down box!!!

item.title: Guide To The Moparscape Forums!
item.dc:creator: @sage_mage721 sage mage721
item.description:
@sage_mage721 wrote:

[quote=“Newbi, post:4, topic:22861”][quote author=rarescape link=topic=34929.msg417350#msg417350 date=1162922253]
GETTING PICTURES ON YOUR THREAD!!!(i dont know how to do it on the webclient, so, i will modifiey it l8ter when i find out.Thank you for your pacients!)Ok, first you will want to have screenshots!!!Hit the F9 button to take a screenshot of the desired picture!!!Then, open up your internet, go to http://imageshack.us/ and hit browse and go into the screenshot section of the moparscape31 folder and double click witch screenshot you want to use, hit the resizeimage box to get a check in it, then, click the drop-down box, hit the 640x480, then, hit host it!then copy and paste the Thumbnail1 UNDER the picture into your thread, and, make your post, and wahla!it should give you a picture!!!LIKE THIS!!!


[/quote]

I type F9, nothing happens, help?[/quote]

I don’t know if F9 works, because I didn’t try it. However, I do know that the “Prt Scr” key (short for Print Screen) that is to the right of the F12 key takes a screen shot. So, I would suggest using that.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Newbi Newbi
item.description:
@Newbi wrote:

[quote=“rarescape, post:1, topic:22861”]GETTING PICTURES ON YOUR THREAD!!!(i dont know how to do it on the webclient, so, i will modifiey it l8ter when i find out.Thank you for your pacients!)Ok, first you will want to have screenshots!!!Hit the F9 button to take a screenshot of the desired picture!!!Then, open up your internet, go to http://imageshack.us/ and hit browse and go into the screenshot section of the moparscape31 folder and double click witch screenshot you want to use, hit the resizeimage box to get a check in it, then, click the drop-down box, hit the 640x480, then, hit host it!then copy and paste the Thumbnail1 UNDER the picture into your thread, and, make your post, and wahla!it should give you a picture!!!LIKE THIS!!!

[/quote]

I type F9, nothing happens, help?

programming, irc, cars
